source_sentence: 佛說給孤長者女得度因緣經
translation: Foshuo jing gives to the orphaned elder's daughter the causes and conditions for obtaining salvation

source_sentence: 卷上
translation: Shangshou

source_sentence: 西天譯經三藏朝奉大夫試光祿
translation: Xitian zhuan jing sanzang朝奉大夫試光祿

source_sentence: 卿傳法大師賜紫臣施護奉　詔譯
translation: You transmitted the imperial edict to the Master Shi Ci, who bestowed upon him the title of Minister of the Dharma.

source_sentence: 如是我聞：一時，佛在舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園，與大聲聞眾俱。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, the Buddha was staying at Anāthapiṇḍada Park in Jeta Grove in Śrāvastī, accompanied by a great assembly of śrāvakas.

source_sentence: 而彼給孤獨長者具大福德，妻子奴婢眷屬熾盛，富饒自在廣積財寶其數無量，
translation: The wealthy man Anāthapiṇḍika was endowed with great virtue. His wives, children, servants, and other members of his retinue were abundant and prosperous, rich and powerful, freely possessing immeasurable wealth and

source_sentence: 與毘沙門天王等無有異。
translation: It's no different from the Vaiśravaṇa and other heavenly kings.

source_sentence: 而彼長者與諸眷屬，常共圍繞嬉戲娛樂，忽於一時其妻懷妊，經於九月生一童女，
translation: The wealthy man and his members of his retinue were always surrounded by him, playing and frolicking together. Suddenly, one day, the wife became pregnant and in nine months she gave birth to a young daughter.

source_sentence: 上色端嚴殊妙無比，身諸相分上下圓滿，人所瞻者無不愛樂。
translation: Their upper form is beautiful and incomparable, their bodies are perfectly proportioned in all respects, and everyone who looks at them will be delighted.

source_sentence: 其女生已，而有種種吉祥善相，以是因緣，父為立名，號善無毒。
translation: Because of these causes and conditions, the father gave the girl a name for her, which was Shan wuzhi (“Good without any poison”).

source_sentence: 復次，去此舍衛國一百六十由旬，有一大城名曰福增，彼有長者名謨尸羅，
translation: “Furthermore, one hundred and sixty yojanas from here in Sāvatthī there is a great city called Pūrvavideha.

source_sentence: 亦具大福德，妻子奴婢眷屬熾盛，富饒自在廣積財寶其數無量，與毘沙門天王等無有異。
translation: They are also endowed with great virtue. Their wives, children, servants, and dependents are abundant and prosperous, and their wealth and possessions are immeasurable. They are no different from those of the Vaiśravaṇa or any

source_sentence: 而彼長者有一童子名曰牛授，上色端嚴殊妙無比，人所瞻者無不愛樂。
translation: That wealthy man had a boy named Niuqu, whose upper color was so beautiful and dignified that it was incomparable that everyone who saw him delighted.

source_sentence: 然其長者及長者子俱事外道，於諸外道深生敬信，即不能知有佛世尊最上最勝，
translation: But the wealthy householders and their children, who were both devoted to heretical doctrines and deeply esteemed heretics, did not know that there was a buddha, the World-honored One, the supreme among all buddhas.

source_sentence: 世尊所有最上法門亦復不聞，神通變化殊勝事業昔所未見。
translation: The Bhagavān also doesn't hear the supreme teaching of the Bhagavān, and his miraculous transformations and extraordinary undertakings have never been seen in the past.

source_sentence: 是諸外道散居異處，或在遨哩迦聚落，或在福增大城，或在作賢大城。
translation: These non-Buddhists scatter and live in different places, either in the village of Bṛhatphala, or in the great city of increasing merit, or in the great city of making goodness.

source_sentence: 是時有一外道，先在福增城中，來詣牛授童子所，謂童子言：「汝今何故而不納妻？」
translation: At the time, there was a non-Buddhist monk who had previously been in the city of Fuxing and came to the boy Caitra and said to the boy, Why don't you accept my wife now?

source_sentence: 牛授答言：「世間若有色相端嚴與我等者，我當娶彼。」
translation: Oxdatta replied, If the world has form and characteristics that are dignified to give them to us, I'll take them.

source_sentence: 時外道言：「童子當知，舍衛國中給孤獨長者有一童女，上色端嚴殊妙無比，
translation: The heretic said, “You should know that in the kingdom of Sāvatthī there was a young woman named Anāthapiṇḍika, with an incomparably beautiful appearance.

source_sentence: 人所瞻者無不愛樂，汝今宜應求彼為妻。」
translation: There's nothing that people won't love and delight in what they see, so now it's appropriate for you to ask her to be your wife.

source_sentence: 牛授聞已心生歡喜，即如其言，易自常服著外道衣，持鉢往詣舍衛國中。
translation: Upon hearing this, Niu gave rise to hearts of joy. Just as he had said, he changed his usual clothes into non-Buddhist robes and went to the kingdom of Śrāvastī with his bowl in hand.

source_sentence: 到已次第持鉢乞食，至給孤獨長者住舍門外。
translation: When he arrived, he took his bowl and begged for food one by one to give it to the orphaned elder who lived outside the door of the house.

source_sentence: 時，善無毒女聞乞食聲，即持飲食出行布施。
translation: When the poisonous woman Shan heard the sound of begging for food, she took food and drink and traveled to give alms.

source_sentence: 其女出已，時牛授童子，得覩其相即生愛樂。
translation: When the woman emerged, the boy Niu gave her to him, and when he saw his marks, he became delighted.

source_sentence: 彼善無毒女，以宿因緣力亦相顧視。
translation: That good and poisonous woman also looked at each other with the power of past causes and conditions.

source_sentence: 然彼善無毒女，見牛授童子是外道相，即時微笑作是告言：「汝是不正知者，
translation: Still, that good and poisonous woman saw that the boy Niu Dao was a non-Buddhist. She smiled and said:

source_sentence: 外道異學，何故住此持鉢乞食？」
translation: Why do non-Buddhists and heretics stay here, holding bowls and begging for food?

source_sentence: 牛授童子聞是語已，亦復微笑不取其食離舍而去，還歸福增城中，白父母言：「父母當知，
translation: After hearing these words, the boy Niudatta also smiled and departed without taking his food. Having left his house, he returned to the city of Puṣkarasārin and said to his parents:

source_sentence: 舍衛國中給孤獨長者有一童女名善無毒，願今與我求彼為妻。」
translation: In the kingdom of Śrāvastī, there's a young woman named Sunakṣatra who gives to an orphaned elder in Sāvatthī and wishes to give her to me now to ask for her as his wife.

source_sentence: 爾時，謨尸羅長者聞是語已，即詣舍衛國中給孤獨長者所，具以此緣而相告語。
translation: After hearing these words, the elder Kauśinagara went to the house of the orphaned elder Anāthapiṇḍika in Sāvatthī and told him about this reason.

source_sentence: 給孤獨長者言：「我雖相許，然當俟我問佛世尊，佛若聽許斯為甚善。」
translation: An orphaned elderly man said, Even though I approve of it, you must wait for me to ask the Bhagavān about it; if the Bhagavān hears and approves of it, it's very good.

source_sentence: 時給孤獨長者即自往詣佛世尊所，禮佛足已具陳上事，佛言：「長者！
translation: The orphaned elder Anāthapiṇḍika then went to the Buddha Bhagavān, bowed his head at his feet, and explained the above matters in detail, and the Buddha said, Elder!

source_sentence: 汝女不應剃髮出家，當聽往彼乃為甚善，彼女若至福增城中，而能廣大施作佛事最上吉祥。」
translation: You daughters shouldn't shave off and leave home; it's very good to hear that they go there, for if they go to the city of increase in merit, they'll be able to vastly perform buddha-works most auspicious.

source_sentence: 是時給孤獨長者，即如佛勅還自舍中，乃出種種珍寶等物，備諸所用依世法儀，
translation: The orphaned elder Anāthapiṇḍika then returned to his own dwelling place as the Buddha had instructed him, produced various treasures and other things for use in accordance with worldly rituals.

source_sentence: 以善無毒女，適牛授童子。
translation: With a woman who's good and without poison, she adapts to the cattle and bestows it on the boy.

source_sentence: 乃至後時彼謨尸羅長者，於自舍中飯諸外道，長者即謂善無毒言：「童女！
translation: Later, that Kauśinagara elder fed the non-Buddhists in his own dwelling, and the elder said to Sunakṣatra, Young woman!

source_sentence: 可來隨喜布施。」
translation: They can come and follow the joy of generosity.

source_sentence: 彼善無毒女，先所不知飯諸外道，聞長者語已，謂是佛諸弟子，舍利子、大目乾連、阿難等，
translation: That good and poisonous woman didn't know the non-Buddhist food that was previously given to them. After hearing what the elder said, he said, 'These are the disciples of the Buddha, Śāriputra, Mahāmaud

source_sentence: 至此受食，即時踊躍歡喜而出，乃見諸外道異學，相貌醜惡如迦迦色，
translation: Upon arriving at this place, he accepted the food. Immediately jumped up and left with joy. He saw heretics of different schools with ugly appearances as if they were khaṭṭika-colored.

source_sentence: 著弊垢衣身體臭穢，裸形無恥復如餓鬼，見是相已，心生忿恚一面而住。
translation: They wear dirty clothes, their bodies smelly and filthy, and their naked forms are shameless like hungry ghosts. Seeing these signs, they become angry in mind and stand to one side.

source_sentence: 時長者言：「童女何故心生退屈？」
translation: The elder then said, Why does the girl's mind become retrogressing?

source_sentence: 女即答言：「我非退屈，然今長者所作施會，若能供養諸聖眾者，當獲勝福。
translation: The woman then replied, I'm not retrogressing, but now that you're an elderly donor, if you can make offerings to the noble ones, you'll attain superior merit.

source_sentence: 云何供養此諸外道作罪業者，得何等利？」
translation: What's the benefit of making offerings to these non-Buddhists who commit crimes?

source_sentence: 長者聞已驚而問言：「童女！
translation: After hearing this, the elder was startled and asked, Young woman!

source_sentence: 世間寧有最勝導師過於此者？」
translation: How could there be a most excellent teacher in the world who goes beyond this?

source_sentence: 彼女答言：「長者善聽！
translation: The woman replied, Listen well, householder!

source_sentence: 舍衛國中有一大園我父所造，有佛世尊現止其中。
translation: In the kingdom of Śrāvastī there was a large park built by my father, in which the Bhagavān appeared and stayed.

source_sentence: 佛世尊者最上最勝，是我之師。
translation: Bhagavān, the Buddha is the highest and most excellent, and he's my teacher.

source_sentence: 父母清淨氏族高勝，姓剎帝利金輪王種，捨輪王位出家修道，厭彼世間富貴等事，
translation: Their parents were pure and their clansmen were noble and powerful. They were all of the kṣatriya caste, from the family of the golden wheel-turning kings (cakravartin). They renounced the status of a wheel-tur

source_sentence: 歷修眾行菩提樹下降魔成佛，諸根相好端嚴具足，現少年相勝妙無比，
translation: He cultivated all the practices of enlightenment, descended from the tree of enlightenment, and became a buddha like Māra. Endowed with good physical appearance, he manifested youthful features that were incomparable and marvelous.

source_sentence: 遊戲神通自在無礙，面現喜輪而為莊嚴，於一切處所作相應。
translation: He plays freely with his supernormal powers, unobstructed, adorned by the manifestation of the joy wheel on his face, associated with what he does in all places.

source_sentence: 又復三十二大人相、八十種隨形好，一一具足，身諸相分圓光普照，頂有光明如千日輪，
translation: Again, the thirty-two marks of greatness and the eighty secondary signs of greatness were each endowed with their respective embellishments. The distinctive characteristics of the body shone brilliantly all over; the top of the

source_sentence: 廣大熾盛最勝嚴飾普遍賢善，巍巍無動如寶山現，一切眾生見者愛樂，
translation: They are vast and blazing, most magnificent and beautifully adorned, universally good and virtuous, lofty and immovable like mountains of jewels. All sentient beings who see them delight in them.

source_sentence: 瞻佛相好心無厭足。
translation: He looked at the Buddha's good appearance and didn't tire of it.

source_sentence: 為諸聲聞隨應說法，一一分別，此是因緣此非因緣，是出離道非出離道，
translation: “World-honored One, the śrāvakas explain the doctrine in accordance with [the capacities of] the listeners, distinguishing one from the other. This is the causal condition and that which is not the causal condition; this is the path

source_sentence: 是所應行非所應行，是神通事非神通事，是世間慧是諸佛慧。
translation: What's to be done and what's not to be done, which is a matter of supernormal abilities and not a matter of supernormal abilities, is worldly wisdom that's the Buddha's wisdom.

source_sentence: 又復世尊善巧方便隨所宣說，皆以最上法語而攝他語，諸有所說悉為利他，
translation: “Furthermore, the World-honored One skillfully and expediently taught that whatever he teaches, always using the words of the supreme teaching to embrace the words of others. Whatever he teaches, he does so for the benefit of others

source_sentence: 此是善惡業，世尊如實說，此是所作行，世尊如實說，此是先所說此是後所說，
translation: These are good and bad actions. The World-honoured One has spoken of them as they really are. These are the deeds that should be done. The World-honoured One has spoken of them as they really are. These were spoken of

source_sentence: 世尊一一如實分別。
translation: Bhagavān, the Bhagavān discerns each one as it is.

source_sentence: 佛說法時面目熙怡，遠離顰蹙常出柔軟語，順善語，甘美語，可愛語，
translation: When the Buddha preached the Dharma his countenance was graceful and pleasant. Free from frowning, he always uttered gentle words that were agreeable, sweet, delicious, and pleasing.

source_sentence: 巧妙語，安慰語，起諸方便隨應說法，悲愍利樂一切眾生，使諸眾生皆悉調伏。
translation: He speaks skillfully, comfortingly, and using appropriate means to teach the Dharma, compassionately benefiting all sentient beings so that all sentient beings will be completely subdued.

source_sentence: 又復世尊為諸聲聞一一分別，是聖人法是異道法，是離塵法是無等法，
令諸聲聞如其所應如理修習，得戒具足，定具足，慧具足，解脫具足，
translation: They cause the śrāvakas to correctly practice as they should, attaining endowment with the precepts, endowment with concentration, endowment with wisdom, and endowment with liberation.

source_sentence: 解脫知見具足。
translation: The knowledge and vision of liberation are complete.

source_sentence: 又復世尊隨往一切聚落方處，若行若止不為一切人非人等而能嬈害，於一切時常以天眼見諸色相，
translation: “Furthermore, the World-honored One, going to all villages and towns, wherever he may be, without being disturbed by any people or non-people, whether they are walking or standing, always sees forms with the divine eye

source_sentence: 常以天耳聞諸音聲，智慧光明廣大照耀，若時若非時，常安住正念。
translation: He always hears sounds with his divine ears, the light of wisdom vastly illuminating and shining, and whether it's time or not, he always abides in right mindfulness.

source_sentence: 當知佛世尊有如是功德，此名世間最勝導師。」
translation: You should know that the Bhagavān has such merit, which is called the world's most excellent guide.

source_sentence: 爾時，謨尸羅長者舍所集外道眾中，有善根成熟者，聞佛功德毛髮竪立涕淚悲泣，
translation: At the time, there were some among the non-Buddhist monks who had good roots and matured in the congregation gathered at the house of the elder Kauśinagara. They heard the Buddha’s virtuous hair stood on end with te

source_sentence: 於佛世尊起清淨心深生敬信，即作是言：「我等願當投佛出家。」
translation: The Bhagavān arouses a pure mind of respect and faith for the Buddha, and he says, We wish to join the Buddha and leave home.

source_sentence: 時謨尸羅長者，聞善無毒女說佛功德，於佛世尊即生淨信，謂童女言：「汝今可能令我得見佛世尊不？」
translation: When the elder Kauśinagara heard the good and poisonous woman explain the Buddha's merits, he had pure faith in the Bhagavān, saying to the girl, Can you now make me see the Bhagavān?

source_sentence: 彼女答言：「若欲見佛世尊及聖眾者，即當辦造最上飲食而為供養。」
translation: The woman answered, If you want to see the Bhagavān Buddha and the noble people, you must prepare the highest food and drink as an offering.

source_sentence: 是時，長者即語其妻令辦飲食，妻乃答言：「善哉長者飲食已辦。」
translation: The elder then told his wife to prepare food and drink, and her wife answered, Good, elder, you've prepared food and drink.

source_sentence: 長者謂童女言：「我不解法，汝當請佛。」
translation: The elder said to the girl, I don't understand the teaching; you must invite the Buddha.

source_sentence: 彼善無毒女即以妙華作曼拏羅向佛世尊所住方處，遙伸禮敬燒眾名香散諸妙華，
translation: That good and poisonous woman then made a maṇḍala of marvelous flowers, went to the place where the Bhagavān Buddha was staying, paid homage, burned names and fragrances, and scattered marvelous flowers.

source_sentence: 一心合掌請佛世尊，作如是言：「佛是一切智具大悲者，隨諸眾生所可樂見皆令如意，
translation: He joined his palms in unison and said to the Buddha, World-honored One, “Buddha is the compassionate one endowed with omniscience who causes sentient beings to follow their wishes according to their inclinations.

source_sentence: 今此謨尸羅長者與諸眷屬，發清淨心樂見世尊，於自住舍已辦種種上味飲食欲伸供養，
translation: “The householder Kauśinagara and his members of his retinue now aroused the pure aspiration to see the World-honored One. Having prepared various delicious foods and drinks for offerings in their own dwelling places,

source_sentence: 世間導師及諸聖眾我今召請，唯願世尊，廣為悲愍利樂眾生，哀受所請至長者舍。」
translation: World-honored One, I've now summoned the worldly guides and sages to this house, but please, Bhagavān, for the sake of pitying sentient beings and benefiting them, take pity on those who are invited to

source_sentence: 是時童女所散妙華，以佛威神力故，於虛空中猶如鵝王，徐徐而下至舍衛國祇樹給孤獨園佛世尊前，
translation: “Then the beautiful flowers scattered by the young daughter of a goddess, resembling a king goose in the sky because of the Buddha’s spiritual power, gradually descended to the buddha-field of Anāthapiṇḍika

source_sentence: 其香如雲最上微妙，結成樓閣旋轉空中。
translation: Its fragrance is like a cloud of the finest subtlety, forming a tower that rotates in the sky.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者阿難見是相已前白佛言：「世尊！
translation: Seeing these signs, Venerable Ānanda said to the Buddha, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今所現瑞，是何方來請佛之相？」
translation: Where did you come from to ask the Buddha for his appearance?

source_sentence: 佛言：「阿難！
translation: The Buddha said, Ānanda!

source_sentence: 汝今當知去此舍衛國，一百六十由旬有一大城名曰福增，彼有長者名謨尸羅，
translation: At the distance of one hundred and sixty yojanas from this country of Sāvatthī there is a great city called Puṣkarasārin, which is located in the center of Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 而彼城中有諸外道今現集會。
translation: In that city, there are non-Buddhist monks who are now gathering together.

source_sentence: 謨尸羅長者請佛及聲聞眾，我等當往，各現神變令彼外道發生淨信，已生信者使不退轉，
translation: The householder Kauśinagara invited the Buddha and the assembly of śrāvakas. We will go there, each manifesting miraculous powers to enable those heretics to develop pure faith so that those who had already developed faith would not turn away

source_sentence: 我當於彼作大利樂，是彼所來請佛之相。
translation: I will create great benefits and pleasures for them, which is the characteristic of the Buddha's invitation from that place.

source_sentence: 汝今宜應鳴彼犍椎，集苾芻眾令自知時，各現神通當往受供。」
translation: Now, it's appropriate for you to ring the gandharva and gather the monks together so that they will know for themselves when they each manifest their supernormal powers and will go there to make offerings.

source_sentence: 爾時，尊者阿難受佛勅已，即鳴犍椎集苾芻眾，作是白言：「已得神通尊者諸阿羅漢諦聽佛勅，
translation: At that time, having received the Buddha’s instructions, Venerable Ānanda sounded the gandharva and assembled the assembly of bhikṣus. He said: Having attained supernatural powers, venerable sirs, listen attentive

source_sentence: 令諸苾芻當自知時，各現神通往福增城中，受謨尸羅長者供。
translation: When the monks were told to know for themselves, each of them manifested their supernormal powers and went to the city of Bṛhatphala to receive an offering from the elder Kauśinagara.

source_sentence: 而彼城中有諸外道今現集會，當令彼等發生淨信，已生信者使不退轉作大利樂。」
translation: In that city, there are non-Buddhists who are now assembled to cause them to give rise to pure faith and those who have already given rise to faith so that they won't regress and become greatly benefited.

source_sentence: 尊者阿難如是白已，次乃行籌，諸阿羅漢各各受籌。
translation: After he had said this, Venerable Ānanda then made his next statement, and the arhats each accepted a chip.

source_sentence: 是時有一苾芻，名崑努鉢陀那，為眾中上座，已證須陀洹果，然未得神通具足而亦受籌。
translation: At the time, there was a monk named Kauṇḍinya, the elder among the saṃgha who had realized the fruit of stream entry but hadn't yet perfected his supernormal powers and accepted the chip.

source_sentence: 時尊者阿難即作是言：「上座苾芻！
translation: Venerable Ānanda then said, Bhagavān!

source_sentence: 今此舍衛國去彼福增城，一百六十由旬，佛勅各令現諸神變而可往彼。」
translation: Now, this country of Śrāvastī is one hundred and sixteen yojanas away from the city of Pūrvavideha, and the Buddha has instructed each of them to show their miraculous powers and be allowed to go there.
